thread.section_title: lastminute.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of lastminute.com | www.lastminute.com
thread.title: Melaney Williams

author: Melaney Williams
title: Melaney Williams
text:
Stayed at the park hotel. Lovely place in museum area.
Warm welcome, room good size for two, room service a bit expensive, but very good!
Had breakfast in bed! They did bring breakfast to early but did take it back and bring another at time requested...Free of charge.
Very clean and tidy. Room cleaned every day, you have tea and coffee facility's, hair dryer, towels, safe, Minnie bar.
Tram runs outside hotel, canal in front of hotel, with trips round Amsterdam.
Very peaceful time, enjoyed everything!
